content: Influencer Pauly has been accused of serious fraud. After Pauly created an altcoin called Pond0x token and created hype among his followers, he dumped Pond0x tokens among his followers investors. Due to these fraudulent activities investors have faced huge losses which are estimated $2.2 million. This incident proves again why crypto users should not give influencers too much importance and blindly trust their advice. These influencers will one day take advantage of the trust of their followers and take large amounts of money by creating a scam project.Pauly's Twitter : https://twitter.com/Pauly0xWebsite: https://www.pond0x.com/https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0x8ad66fb25748af9b94f56824bb2fdf347dc9c618https://twitter.com/RuneCrypto_/status/1684959197526405121Source:https://cointelegraph.com/news/pond0x-token-launch-snafu-leads-millions-dollars-losseshttps://www.investing.com/news/cryptocurrency-news/pond0x-token-launch-snafu-leads-to-millions-of-dollars-in-losses-3137983https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/64c4c120ab98f466e8614555/QuoteDomain Name: pond0x.comRegistry Domain ID: 2784213364_DOMAIN_COM-VRSNRegistrar WHOIS Server: whois.google.comRegistrar URL: https://domains.google.comUpdated Date: 2023-05-25T21:43:56ZCreation Date: 2023-05-25T21:43:55ZRegistrar Registration Expiration Date: 2024-05-25T21:43:55ZRegistrar: Google LLCRegistrar IANA ID: 895Registrar Abuse Contact Email: email@google.comRegistrar Abuse Contact Phone: +1.8772376466

comments.body: These rugpulls have been common to these influencers that have the idea that their followers will surely buy whatever they feed them. Even they feed them with literal shit and shitcoins, these followers are the blind ones and they don't mind to follow whatever they say. I just hope that this influencer will get sued and there will be a victim that will come into light and will pursue on what this guy did. Since he's a public figure, anyone from those victims can seek help from the authorities and state what has happened with this rugpulled project that he has made. It's also possible that these victims go with a consensus so that they can file a case against him and so he'll get sued. There's power in unity and if that happens, the other influencers that have been shilling and feeding shitcoins to their followers will see that they can't just do that anymore. I know that there's also the fault from these investors and followers but they've been victimized and blindly attracted to these influencers and misled.
